SENT.plain: The 10th International Congress on Antiphospholipid Antibodies (Sicily, Italy, September 29-October 3, 2002) (Fig. 1) provided enlightening aspects on the recent developments in antiphospholipid syndrome (APS) and antiphospholipid antibodies in more than 150 lectures and posters
Researchers from all aspects of medicine attended the meeting, implicating the systemic characteristics of APS
